data:
{ "name": "Sale Invoice A4", "title": "Sale Invoice", "doc_type": "Sale", "module": "Selling", "default_print_language": "en", "standard": "No", "custom_format": 0, "show_in_pos": 1, "show_in_pos_report": 1, "show_in_pos_closed_sale": 0, "show_in_reservation_stay_detail": 0, "print_report_name": null, "sort_order": 0, "disabled": 0, "print_format_type": "Jinja", "raw_printing": 0, "html": null, "raw_commands": null, "margin_top": 5, "margin_bottom": 5, "margin_left": 10, "margin_right": 10, "align_labels_right": 0, "show_section_headings": 0, "line_breaks": 0, "absolute_value": 0, "font_size": 14, "font": null, "page_number": "Bottom Center", "css": "\r\n.report-list {\r\n margin-top: 10px !important;\r\n margin-bottom: 10px !important;\r\n}\r\n.report-list td,.tbl-payment-list td {\r\n padding-top: 6px!important;\r\n padding-bottom: 6px!important;\r\n}\r\n.tbl-list tr td,.tbl-list-summary table tr td {\r\n padding: 4px 0px !important;\r\n font-size: 13px !important;\r\n}\r\n.tbl-list tr td:nth-child(2), .tbl-list-summary table tr td:nth-child(2){\r\n padding-left: 4px !important;\r\n padding-right: 4px !important;\r\n}\r\n.tbl-list-right tr td:nth-child(3), .tbl-list-summary table tr td:nth-child(3){\r\n text-align: right;\r\n}\r\n.report-list thead {\r\n background: #f3f3f3;\r\n}\r\n.report-list thead tr th {\r\n color: #000;\r\n font-weight: 600;\r\n}\r\n.report-list th, .report-list td {\r\n border: 1px solid #d9d9d9 !important;\r\n}\r\n.tbl-list-summary table tr td:nth-child(3) {\r\n min-width: 100px;\r\n}\r\n.tbl-payment-list tbody td {\r\n border-top: none !important;\r\n}\r\n.tbl-payment-list thead {\r\n border-bottom: 1px solid #d9d9d9;\r\n font-weight: 600;\r\n}", "format_data": "[{\"fieldname\": \"print_heading_template\", \"fieldtype\": \"Custom HTML\", \"options\": \"

{{_(\\\"Sale\\\")}}

\\r\\n\\r\\n
\\r\\n {% if doc.docstatus == 1 %}\\r\\n \\r\\n {% if doc.balance == 0 and doc.is_free == 1%}\\r\\n {{_(\\\"Paid\\\")}}\\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n {% if doc.total_paid > 0 and doc.balance > 0 %}\\r\\n {{_(\\\"Partially Paid\\\")}}\\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n {%if doc.is_free == 0%}\\r\\n {% if doc.total_paid == 0 %}\\r\\n {{_(\\\"Unpaid\\\")}}\\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n {%endif%}\\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\\r\\n{% if doc.customer %}\\r\\n{% set customer = frappe.get_doc('Customer',doc.customer,['*']) %}\\r\\n {% if customer %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% if customer.company_name %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n {% if customer.phone_number %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n
{{_(\\\"Customer Code\\\")}}:{{customer.name}}
{{_(\\\"Customer Name\\\")}}:{{customer.customer_name_en}}
{{_(\\\"Company\\\")}}:{{customer.company_name}}
{{_(\\\"Phone Number\\\")}}:{{customer.phone_number}}
\\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\\r\\n \\r\\n
\\r\\n
\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% if doc.referance %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n
{{_(\\\"Sale #\\\")}}:{{doc.name}}
{{_(\\\"Ref #\\\")}}:{{doc.referance}}
{{_(\\\"Date\\\")}}:{{doc.posting_date}}
{{_(\\\"Branch\\\")}}:{{doc.business_branch}}
{{_(\\\"Stock Location\\\")}}:{{doc.stock_location}}
\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\"}, {\"fieldtype\": \"Section Break\", \"label\": \"Product List\"}, {\"fieldtype\": \"Column Break\"}, {\"fieldname\": \"_custom_html\", \"print_hide\": 0, \"label\": \"Custom HTML\", \"fieldtype\": \"HTML\", \"options\": \"{% \\r\\n set sale_transactions = frappe.db.sql(\\\"\\r\\n select \\r\\n p.product_code,\\r\\n sum(p.quantity) as qty, \\r\\n p.price, \\r\\n p.unit,\\r\\n concat(p.product_name,if(coalesce(p.portion,'')='','',concat('-', p.portion)),\\r\\n if(coalesce(p.modifiers,'')='','',concat('-', p.modifiers)),\\r\\n if(p.is_free=1,'-Free','')) \\r\\n as product_name,\\r\\n sum(p.sub_total) as amount,\\r\\n s.customer_name \\r\\n from \\r\\n `tabSale Product` p \\r\\n inner join\\r\\n `tabSale` s on s.name = p.parent \\r\\n where \\r\\n s.name = '{}' \\r\\n group by \\r\\n p.product_name,\\r\\n p.price,\\r\\n p.portion,\\r\\n p.modifiers,\\r\\n p.unit\\r\\n \\\".format(doc.name),as_dict=1)%}\\r\\n\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% for p in sale_transactions %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endfor %}\\r\\n \\r\\n
{{_(\\\"No\\\")}}{{_(\\\"Description\\\")}}{{_(\\\"QTY\\\")}}{{_(\\\"Unit\\\")}}{{_(\\\"Price\\\")}}{{_(\\\"Amount\\\")}}
{{sale_transactions.index(p)+1}}{{p.product_code}} - {{p.product_name}}{{p.qty}}{{p.unit}}{{ frappe.format_value(p.price,\\\"Currency\\\") }}{{frappe.format_value(p.amount,\\\"Currency\\\")}}
\"}, {\"fieldname\": \"_custom_html\", \"print_hide\": 0, \"label\": \"Custom HTML\", \"fieldtype\": \"HTML\", \"options\": \" {%set main_currency = frappe.get_doc(\\\"Currency\\\",frappe.db.get_default(\\\"currency\\\"))%}\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\\r\\n {% set payments = frappe.get_list('Sale Payment',filters={\\r\\n 'sale': doc.name,'docstatus':1},fields=['*'],order_by='posting_date asc') %}\\r\\n {% if payments %}\\r\\n

Payment Breakdown

\\r\\n {% for payment in payments %}\\r\\n - {{payment.payment_type}}\\r\\n {% if payment.fee_amount > 0 %}\\r\\n (+Fee: {{frappe.utils.fmt_money(payment.fee_amount, currency=main_currency.name, precision=main_currency.currency_precision)}})\\r\\n {% endif %} : {{frappe.utils.fmt_money(payment.input_amount +(payment.fee_amount * payment.exchange_rate) ,currency=payment.currency, precision=payment.currency_precision)}}\\r\\n {% if payments|length > 1 %} \\r\\n \\r\\n
\\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n \\r\\n {% endfor %}\\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% if doc.total_discount > 0 %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n {% if doc.total_tax > 0 %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% if doc.total_paid > 0 %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n {% if doc.balance > 0 %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n {% if doc.changed_amount > 0 %}\\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n \\r\\n {% endif %}\\r\\n
{{_(\\\"Total Quantity\\\")}}:{{doc.total_quantity}}
{{_(\\\"Sub Total\\\")}}:{{frappe.format_value(doc.sub_total,\\\"Currency\\\")}}
{{_(\\\"Total Discount\\\")}}:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.total_discount,\\\"Currency\\\") }}
{{_(\\\"Total Tax\\\")}}:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.total_tax,\\\"Currency\\\") }}
{{_(\\\"Grand Total\\\")}}:{{frappe.format_value(doc.grand_total,\\\"Currency\\\")}}
{{_(\\\"Total Paid\\\")}}:{{frappe.format_value(doc.total_paid_with_fee,\\\"Currency\\\")}}
{{_(\\\"Balance\\\")}}:{{frappe.format_value(doc.balance,\\\"Currency\\\")}}
{{_(\\\"Change\\\")}}:{{frappe.format_value(doc.changed_amount,\\\"Currency\\\")}}
\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\\r\\n
\"}]", "print_format_builder": 0, "print_format_builder_beta": 0, "pos_invoice_file_name": null, "pos_receipt_file_name": null, "receipt_height": 11, "receipt_width": 3.14, "receipt_margin_top": 0, "receipt_margin_bottom": 0, "receipt_margin_left": 0, "receipt_margin_right": 0, "print_invoice_copies": 0, "print_receipt_copies": 0, "report_options": null, "doctype": "Print Format" }

\"}, {\"fieldtype\": \"Section Break\", \"label\": \"\"}, {\"fieldtype\": \"Column Break\"}, {\"fieldname\": \"_custom_html\", \"print_hide\": 0, \"label\": \"Custom HTML\", \"fieldtype\": \"HTML\", \"options\": \"

    "business_branch": "Main Branch",
    "pos_profile_name": "Main POS Profile",
    "outlet": "Main Outlet",
    "stock_location": "Main Warehouse",
    "price_rule": "Normal Rate",
    "tax_rule": "",
